channel.title: Please help..client-compiler problem..(HELP PLEASE)
channel.description:
Ok well im useing a dodian based source and i was trying to make it so u had to pay for premium like i was trying to make the whole premium thing, and while doing so i messed something up and got 100 errors i will show the errors i get> (PLEASE HELP)
^ client.java:65: illegal start of expression public boolean adding = false, emoting = false; ^ client.java:67: illegal start of expression public int allignment = 0; ^ client.java:68: illegal start of expression public boolean alreadyChose = false; ^ client.java:69: illegal start of expression public int[] ancientButton = { 51133, 51185, -1, 51091, 24018, -1, 51159 , ^ client.java:72: illegal start of expression public int[] ancientId = { 12939, 12987, 0, 12901, 12861, 0, 12963, 1301 1, ^ client.java:75: illegal start of expression public int ancients = 1; ^ client.java:76: illegal start of expression public boolean ancientstele = false; ^ client.java:77: illegal start of expression public int[] ancientType = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 1, 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 1, 0, 0, 1 , ^ client.java:79: illegal start of expression public int angle = 250; ^ client.java:81: illegal start of expression public boolean AnimationReset; // Resets Animations With The Use Of The ^ client.java:82: illegal start of expression public int AntiTeleDelay; ^ client.java:83: illegal start of expression public int arenaSpellTimer; ^ client.java:84: illegal start of expression public int attackedNpcId = -1; ^ client.java:85: illegal start of expression public int AttackingOn = 0; ^ client.java:86: illegal start of expression public int autocast_spellIndex = -1; ^ client.java:88: illegal start of expression public int barTimer = 0, saveTimer = 0; ^ client.java:89: illegal start of expression public int[] baseDamage = { 1, 2, 0, 3, 4, 0, 5, 6, 0, 7, 8, 0, 9, 10, 0 , ^ client.java:91: illegal start of expression public String BonusMySqlName[] = { "attack_stab", "attack_slash", ^ client.java:96: illegal start of expression public String BonusName[] = { "Stab", "Slash", "Crush", "Magic", "Range" , ^ client.java:98: illegal start of expression public byte buffer[] = null; ^ client.java:100: illegal start of expression public int[] casketItems = { 4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 1050, 1053, 1055, ^ client.java:102: illegal start of expression public boolean cast = false; // Part Of The Create Spell Code ^ client.java:103: illegal start of expression public boolean castleWarsOn = false; ^ client.java:105: illegal start of expression public boolean castSpell, isStillSpell; ^ client.java:106: illegal start of expression public int cba; ^ client.java:110: illegal start of expression public int clickIndex = 0; ^ client.java:111: illegal start of expression public int[] clicks = new int[50]; ^ client.java:112: illegal start of expression public int CombatExpRate = 1; ^ client.java:113: illegal start of expression public String converse; ^ client.java:114: illegal start of expression private int cooking[] = { 0, 0, 0, 1, -1, -1, -1 }; ^ client.java:115: illegal start of expression public long[] coolDown = { 5000, 5000, 2500, 5000 }; ^ client.java:116: illegal start of expression public int[] coolDownGroup = { 2, 2, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 2, 1, ^ client.java:121: illegal start of expression public int currentButton = 0, currentStatus = 0; ^ client.java:122: illegal start of expression public int cwAmount = 0; ^ client.java:123: illegal start of expression public int cwTimer = 0; ^ client.java:127: illegal start of expression public String dMsg = ""; ^ client.java:128: illegal start of expression public int doors = -1; ^ client.java:130: illegal start of expression public int duel_with = 0; ^ client.java:132: illegal start of expression public boolean duelAccept1 = false; ^ client.java:133: illegal start of expression public boolean duelAccept2 = false; ^ client.java:134: illegal start of expression public int[] duelButtons = { 26069, 26070, 26071, 30136, 2158, 26065, ^ client.java:136: illegal start of expression public int[] duelItems = new int[28]; ^ client.java:137: illegal start of expression public int[] duelItemsN = new int[28]; ^ client.java:138: illegal start of expression public boolean[] duelItemsNoted = new boolean[28]; ^ client.java:139: illegal start of expression public int[] duelLine = { 6698, 6699, 6697, 7817, 669, 6696, 6701, 6702,
^ client.java:141: illegal start of expression public String[] duelNames = { "No Range", "No Melee", "No Mage", ^ client.java:144: illegal start of expression public int duelpartner = 0; ^ client.java:145: illegal start of expression public boolean duelReq = false; ^ client.java:146: illegal start of expression public boolean duelRequested = false, inDuel = false, ^ client.java:149: illegal start of expression public boolean[] duelRule = { false, false, false, false, false, true, ^ client.java:151: illegal start of expression public int duelWho = 0; ^ client.java:152: illegal start of expression public int[] effects = new int[10]; ^ client.java:153: illegal start of expression private int emotes = 0; ^ client.java:154: illegal start of expression public int enemyId = -1, enemyX = -1, enemyY = -1, attackTimer = 0; ^ client.java:155: illegal start of expression public int EntangleDelay = 0; ^ client.java:159: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRX[] = { 3253, 3105, 2681, 2591 }; ^ client.java:160: illegal start of expression public int EssenceMineRY[] = { 3401, 9571, 3325, 3086 }; item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
